body:
What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
My username in Minecraft is vladthegreat100, I'll never change it :wink: And my favourite gamemode on Avicus would have to be Destroy. Would have been Survival Games but its no longer there

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
Hi, my name is Vlad and I'm 16, turning 17 in 7 days!! I've been apart of the Avicus community for almost 3 years and was introduced by MLGPorky. I'm passionate about playing the violin and have actually been playing the instrument for 9 years now. Sports I do is swimming, rugby and recreationally I will play soccer (I think I'm the next Messi TBH :pp )


What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
Well at the moment other than getting my results to my Junior Mod trial (That I surprisingly got) would probably be the winter break which starts after school this upcoming Friday!! Been losing so much sleep lately due to school... I need it.


What interests you the most in life?
Right now, either the violin or film making!!


What music/art/media do you like?
For music I actually like pretty much all genres, but my top 2 are Trap and Classical. For media, I'm more of the black comedy (Dark Humor) type of guy

Where are you from?
I was born in Canada! My parents are from Romania tho haha

What are the most common questions you get asked while
moderating?
"When did you get Junior Mod????"

Anything else you want to mention?
Er, other then spending hundreds of dollars on the server, I'm also known for having created a hate group and have been Network banned before?
